Add labels to an issue 

POST /repos/:owner/:repo/issues/:number/labels

Input

[
  "bug",
  "enhancement"
]

Response

Status: 200 OK

[
  {
    "id": 208045946,
    "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/labels/bug",
    "name": "bug",
    "color": "f29513",
    "default": true
  },
  {
    "id": 208045947,
    "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/labels/enhancement",
    "name": "enhancement",
    "color": "a2eeef",
    "default": false
  }
]
